com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Interface INodeSizeConstraintProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NodeSizeConstraintProvider

    public interface INodeSizeConstraintProvider
    An interface used by implementations that provide various size constraints for INodes.
    See Also:
    NodeSizeConstraintProvider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SizeD getMaximumSize(INode node)
      Returns the maximum size allowed for the given node.
      RectD getMinimumEnclosedArea(INode node)
      Returns the minimum area that needs to be enclosed by the given node.
      SizeD getMinimumSize(INode node)
      Returns the minimum size allowed for the given node.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaximumSize

        SizeD getMaximumSize(INode node)
        Returns the maximum size allowed for the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to return the maximum size for.
        Returns:
        The maximum size or SizeD.INFINITE if there is no constraint on the size.

      • getMinimumEnclosedArea

        RectD getMinimumEnclosedArea(INode node)
        Returns the minimum area that needs to be enclosed by the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to return the area for.
        Returns:
        The area to enclose or RectD.EMPTY if there is no constraint on the size due to an enclosed area.

      • getMinimumSize

        SizeD getMinimumSize(INode node)
        Returns the minimum size allowed for the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to return the minimum size for.
        Returns:
        The minimum size or SizeD.EMPTY if there is no constraint on the size.
